TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAsyncResult

span.span: Represents the status of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口由包含可异步操作的方法的类实现。The interface is implemented by classes containing methods that can operate asynchronously. 它是启动异步操作的方法 (如) 的返回类型, 它将传递给结束异步操作 ( 如) 的方法。It is the return type of methods that initiate an asynchronous operation, such as , and it is passed to methods that conclude an asynchronous operation, such as . 在异步操作完成时, 还会将对象传递给委托调用的方法。 objects are also passed to methods invoked by delegates when an asynchronous operation completes. 一个对象, 该对象支持一个异步操作的状态信息, 并提供一个同步对象, 允许在操作完成时终止线程。An object that supports the interface stores state information for an asynchronous operation and provides a synchronization object to allow threads to be signaled when the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > 类是在使用委托以异步方式调用方法时`BeginInvoke`由方法返回的的实现。 The class is the implementation of that is returned by the `BeginInvoke` method when you use a delegate to call a method asynchronously. 有关如何使用接口的详细说明, 请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)主题。For a detailed description of how the interface is used, see the [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) topic. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性获取, 并演示如何等待异步调用委托。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to get a , and how to wait for an asynchronous call on a delegate. 当异步调用完成时 会收到信号，而你可以通过调用 方法来等待它。The is signaled when the asynchronous call completes, and you can wait for it by calling the method. 该示例由两个类组成: 包含异步调用的方法的类和包含`Main`进行调用的方法的类。The example consists of two classes: the class that contains the method that is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关使用委托异步调用方法的详细信息和示例, 请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/waithandle.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/waithandle.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/WaitHandle.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AsyncState As Object
public: property System::Object ^ AsyncState { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个用户定义的对象，该对象限定或包含有关异步操作的信息。

span.span: Gets a user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.

value.span: 一个用户定义的对象，限定或包含有关异步操作的信息。

span.span: A user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回对象, 该对象是启动异步操作的方法的最后一个参数。This property returns the object that is the last parameter of the method that initiates an asynchronous operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将信息传递给回调方法。The following code example demonstrates how the property is used to pass information to a callback method. `BeginInvoke`方法调用的最后一个参数是一个格式字符串, 回调方法使用它来设置输出消息的格式。The last parameter of the `BeginInvoke` method call is a format string, which the callback method uses to format an output message. 该示例由两个类组成: 包含异步调用的方法的类和包含`Main`进行调用的方法的类。The example consists of two classes: the class that contains the method that is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关此回调示例如何工作的详细信息, 以及使用委托异步调用方法的更多示例, 请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information about how this callback example works, and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/callback.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/callback.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/callback.vb#5)]

para.span: 实现此属性可允许异步操作的调用方获取在操作开始时指定的应用程序定义的对象。

span.span: Implement this property to allow the caller of an asynchronous operation to obtain an application-defined object specified at the start of the operation.

para.span: 此对象可用于将异步操作的状态信息传递给您提供的。

span.span: This object can be used to pass state information for the asynchronous operation to an that you provide.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AsyncWaitHandle As WaitHandle
public: property System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ AsyncWaitHandle { System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于等待异步操作完成的 。

span.span: Gets a that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.

value.span: 用于等待异步操作完成的 。

span.span: A that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值允许客户端等待异步操作完成, 而不是轮询直到操作结束。The return value allows the client to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete instead of polling until the operation concludes. 返回值可用于执行、 或操作。The return value can be used to perform a , , or operation. 公共语言运行时提供多个可等待对象, 如、 和, 它们都是镜像 Win32 同步基元。The common language runtime supplies a number of waitable objects, such as , , and , all of which mirror Win32 synchronization primitives. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性获取, 并演示如何等待异步调用委托。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to get a , and how to wait for an asynchronous call on a delegate. 当异步调用完成时 会收到信号，而你可以通过调用 方法来等待它。The is signaled when the asynchronous call completes, and you can wait for it by calling the method. 该示例由两个类组成: 包含异步调用的方法的类和包含`Main`进行调用的方法的类。The example consists of two classes: the class that contains the method that is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关使用委托异步调用方法的详细信息和示例, 请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/waithandle.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/waithandle.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/WaitHandle.vb#3)]

para.span: 实现的对象不需要创建, 直到读取属性。

span.span: The object that implements does not need to create the until the property is read.
It is the choice of the implementer.

para.span: 但是, 如果实施者创建了, 则由实施者负责发出信号, 指示将在适当时间终止等待。

span.span: However, if the implementer creates , it is the responsibility of the implementer to signal the that will terminate the wait at the appropriate time.

para.span: 例如, 当异步调用的方法返回时, 会代表调用方终止等待。

span.span: For example, terminates the wait on behalf of the caller when an asynchronously invoked method returns.

para.span: 创建后, 应保持活动状态, 直到用户调用结束异步操作的方法。

span.span: Once created, should be kept alive until the user calls the method that concludes the asynchronous operation.

para.span: 此时, 可以放弃后面的对象。

span.span: At that time the object behind can be discarded.

para.span: 等待操作完成的客户端 (而不是轮询) 使用此属性来获取要等待的同步对象。

span.span: Clients that wait for the operation to complete (as opposed to polling) use this property to obtain a synchronization object to wait on.

para.span: 当你使用委托的方法异步调用方法并从生成的等待句柄获取等待句柄时, 我们建议你在使用完等待句柄后立即通过调用方法来关闭该等待句柄。

span.span: When you use the method of a delegate to call a method asynchronously and obtain a wait handle from the resulting , we recommend that you close the wait handle as soon as you are finished using it, by calling the method.

para.span: 如果只是释放对等待句柄的所有引用, 则当垃圾回收回收等待句柄时将释放系统资源, 但当显式关闭或释放可释放对象时, 垃圾回收的工作效率会更高。

span.span: If you simply release all references to the wait handle, system resources are freed when garbage collection reclaims the wait handle, but garbage collection works more efficiently when disposable objects are explicitly closed or disposed.

para.span: 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。

span.span: For more information, see the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CompletedSynchronously As Boolean
public: property bool CompletedSynchronously { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示异步操作是否同步完成。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the asynchronous operation completed synchronously.

value.span: 如果异步操作同步完成，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在委托中检测到调用的同步完成, 则启动异步操作的线程可能是当前线程。If the synchronous completion of the call is detected in the delegate, it is probable that the thread that initiated the asynchronous operation is the current thread.

para.span: 接口的大多数实现者将不会使用此属性, 并且应返回。

span.span: Most implementers of the interface will not use this property and should return .

para.span: 从开始 , 如果未正确实现此属性, 则使用方法创建的任务将无法完成。 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]

span.span: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], a task that is created with the method will not complete if this property is not implemented correctly.

para.span: 请参阅[4.5 中的应用程序兼容性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/application-compatibility-in-the-net-framework-4-5.md)。

span.span: See [Application Compatibility in 4.5](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/application-compatibility-in-the-net-framework-4-5.md).

para.span: 使用此属性来确定异步操作是否同步完成。

span.span: Use this property to determine if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously.

para.span: 例如, 如果 i/o 请求太小 , 则此属性可为异步 i/o 操作返回。

span.span: For example, this property can return for an asynchronous I/O operation if the I/O request was small.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCompleted As Boolean
public: property bool IsCompleted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示异步操作是否已完成。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the asynchronous operation has completed.

value.span: 如果操作完成则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the operation is complete; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性为`true`时, 你可以假定丢弃分配给异步操作使用的任何资源是安全的。When this property is `true`, you can assume it is safe to discard any resources you allocate for use by the asynchronous operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用的属性来发现异步调用何时完成。The following example shows how to use the property of the to discover when an asynchronous call completes. 在这种情况下, 异步调用是使用`BeginInvoke`委托的方法进行的。In this case, the asynchronous call is made by using the `BeginInvoke` method of a delegate. 当从服务于用户界面的线程进行异步调用时, 可以使用属性来轮询完成。You might use the property to poll for completion when making the asynchronous call from a thread that services the user interface. 对完成情况进行轮询允许在 线程中执行异步调用时继续执行调用线程。Polling for completion allows the calling thread to continue executing while the asynchronous call executes on a thread. 该示例由两个类组成: 包含异步调用的方法的类和包含`Main`进行调用的方法的类。The example consists of two classes: the class that contains the method that is called asynchronously, and the class that contains the `Main` method that makes the call. 有关使用委托异步调用方法的详细信息和示例, 请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information and more examples of calling methods asynchronously by using delegates, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/TestMethod.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/TestMethod.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/TestMethod.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[AsyncDelegateExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/cpp/polling.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[AsyncDelegateExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/CS/polling.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AsyncDelegateExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDelegateExamples/VB/polling.vb#4)]

para.span: 实施者通常会将私有字段或内部测试的值作为此属性的值返回。

span.span: Implementers will typically return the value of a private field or internal test as the value of this property.

para.span: 轮询操作状态的客户端 (而不是等待同步对象) 使用此属性来确定操作的状态。

span.span: Clients that poll for operation status (as opposed to waiting on a synchronization object) use this property to determine the status of the operation.
